abstract: David Barboza, The Times’s Shanghai bureau chief, responds to questions from readers.
snippet: David Barboza, The Times’s Shanghai bureau chief, responds to questions from readers.
lead_paragraph: On Wednesday, Economix asked readers to submit questions for David Barboza, who has reported for The Times from Shanghai since 2004. Mr. Barboza’s article, “Entrepreneur’s Rival in China: The State,” was published on the front page of Thursday’s paper.

headline.main: Answers to Questions About China’s Economy
